org.apache.oozie.service

Class SchemaService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oozie.service.SchemaService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service

    public class SchemaService
extends Object
implements Service
    Service that loads Oozie workflow definition schema and registered extension schemas.
